column1: # British Rainfall lists the 1917-1919 Alford/Hodgson records as at 'Finsbery Street' - this is not shown on the 1910s rainfall sheet, which is just labelled 'Cemetery'.
# Alford has 'new' and 'old' cemeteries close to each other.
# This seems to be the 'new' cemetery, as there is a nearby chapel.
